sentences.english: And make Tianjin caly figurines is to shine is famous of Zhang's Painted caly figurines.
sentences.chinese: 而使得天津泥塑大放異彩的，是“泥人張”的彩塑。

sentences.english: No less, knead into two clay figurine.
sentences.chinese: 不多不少，捏成兩個泥人。

sentences.english: This is famous folk craft of Tianjin, Niren Zhang clay figurines.
sentences.chinese: 它們就是天津有名的工藝品，泥人張。

sentences.english: Many people were specially engaged in the production of clay figurines and sold them as commodity.
sentences.chinese: 有許多人專門從事泥人制作，作爲商品出售。

sentences.english: The clay figure is a work of great originality.
sentences.chinese: 這尊泥人是頗具獨創性的作品。

sentences.english: We've got paper-cutting, embroidery, clay dolls and seal carving.
sentences.chinese: 我們有剪紙，刺繡，捏泥人和篆刻。

sentences.english: In the slack seasons, nearly all families in Wuxi stayed at home to make clay figurines.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，一到農閒季節，幾乎家家都作泥人。

sentences.english: In the beginning of the year, we decided to do claymation.
sentences.chinese: 在今年初，我們決定拍泥人動畫片。

sentences.english: Iron Golems are now saved with the player.
sentences.chinese: 鐵有生命的泥人現在和運動員被救出。

definition: a pottery figurine buried with the dead
